captions.text:
Yeah let me tell you
about this one girl I know

Last night,
I looked over your shoulders

Your phone was ringing
You weren't answering

After this night 
You'll go back to him

Before the morning
I'll have to let you go

Lie down at my side
as my love

You and me,
 just until the next morning

After a few hours,
you'll be with him

You can play well
I'm just a kid

You laugh
You take off the towel
I know I'm not supposed to

But I can't help 
falling in love with you

Don't you ever 
make me cry

I make myself a promise
 many times

Why I keep 
coming back to you

I wander around,
 looking for you
I'll have to get rid of it

You speak lightly 
when to meet him tomorrow

I'm right here
What is this
I try to hear the voice
Why I can't give you up
Just like a bad soap opera

She's the only one 
who knows everything

Anyway, 
you'll be a good girl tomorrow

I'm the one 
who want this relationship

Don't you ever 
make me cry
